reviews.text: Stayed here for business in Jan 09. For me the fact that there was no elevator and I had to walk my huge suitcase up and down the stairs was a bummer. On the upside, I had the best breakfast in the world at the Days Inn and it was FREE!
reviews.title: Give me more free breakfast!

reviews.text: The front desk could not add my rewards number to the stay and told me I had to call or go online to add it (they make you wait 10 days via phone/net). Hotel feels old but the actual rooms are pretty nice and modern, Internet and printing is free downstairs. Parking is free of course. Easy access to freeway and close to the airport.
reviews.title: Very comfortable

likes.disliked: — televison and internet problems with staff that don't know how to fix them, no free hot breakfast for children

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The front desk staff during the day is very helpful, the night staff did not know how to fix the television or internet (she did however give us the number for Wyndham tech support and they helped us with the internet...no luck with the tv though), The room was very clean but small. We had a hard time fitting a rollaway bed in there because the rooms have a safe which is right where the best spot for a rollaway bed would be. The beds are amazing!!! They are pillow topped and each bed had 4 pillows and soft linens.
reviews.title: Good experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hot cooked to order breakfast was fantastic. My one and only complaint about breakfast is that they do not give it to the children. The children get the continental breakfast unless you pay for them to have the hot breakfast. My kids didn't want to eat cereal while mom and dad were having eggs, pancakes and bacon. The breakfast room is nice and big with lots of seating.
reviews.title: By far, best hotel value in Helena!

likes.liked: — The Free Cook to Order Breakfast

reviews.title: Don't stay at the Days Inn in Helena. Unethical Company
reviews.text: There is a hot tub and sauna but no swimming pool. The hot tub was very relaxing and you can watch television while you soak.
